data.expected_result: Keyboard should reopen. I know it used to do that before, also other screens like "Join a server" have this behavior
data.short_description: Keyboard doesn't reopen as it used to do when switching from landscape to portrait in Search
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server  - Go to Search (manifying glass icon)  - Make sure keyboard is open - Rotate from Portrait to Landscape mode  - Rotate back to Portrait
